response.original_title: 実録!!ほんとにあった恐怖の投稿映像 33
response.overview: The 33rd installment of a popular series that introduces all 10 episodes of carefully selected horror videos that have been posted!! So far, I've introduced strange phenomena that are reflected in home videos of ordinary households, and ghosts that have slipped into surveillance cameras. Again in "Itayo", a psychic phenomenon was once witnessed at an unpopular shrine. The author forcibly takes a reluctant friend to visit a shrine with a history. And... it seems that the body of a kidnapped woman was found at this shrine some time ago.
response.title: Actual Record! Real Horror Posted Video 33
